history.remove_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this guide from history?
history.clear_all_confirm: This will permanently delete your entire viewing history. This action cannot be undone.
history.original_guide_not_found: Original guide content could not be found.
history.empty_desc: Your viewing history will appear here as you explore guides.

home.title: SAFE+SOUND
home.disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è This app provides general first aid information only. Always seek professional medical help in emergencies. Call 911 (or your local emergency number) immediately for serious injuries.

emergency.title: EMERGENCY HOTLINES
emergency.call_first_desc: Always call emergency services immediately for life-threatening situations
emergency.observe_desc: Stay calm and observe the patient's condition to report accurately
emergency.time_it_desc: Note the time of emergency for medical professionals
emergency.location_desc: Know your exact location to guide emergency responders
emergency.communicate_desc: Stay on the line with dispatcher and follow instructions
emergency.stay_safe_desc: Protect yourself and bystanders before providing aid

guide.unable_to_call: Unable to make phone call. Please dial manually.

settings.title: Settings
settings.offline_mode_desc: Use the app without internet connection
settings.clear_searches_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear your recent searches?
settings.clear_history_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear your viewing history?
settings.clear_all_confirm: This will permanently delete all app data including history, searches, favorites, and offline data. This action cannot be undone.
settings.clear_all_success: All app data has been cleared
settings.app_description: Safe+Sound is an offline-first first aid guide app designed to provide quick access to emergency response procedures when you need them most.
settings.app_disclaimer: ‚ö†Ô∏è Always seek professional medical help for emergencies. This app provides general first aid information only.

disclaimer.title: Medical Disclaimer
disclaimer.subtitle: Please read carefully before using the app.
disclaimer.not_medical_advice: This app provides general first aid information and is not medical advice.
disclaimer.call_emergency: In emergencies, call 911 (or your local emergency number) immediately.
disclaimer.if_trained: Only perform CPR/AED or other advanced steps if you are trained (or as directed by an emergency dispatcher).
disclaimer.training_encouraged: We encourage users to seek formal first aid/CPR training.
disclaimer.seek_help: If you think someone is in danger, stop reading and call emergency services.

sources.title: Sources & References
sources.subtitle: References used to write and review the in-app first aid guidance.
sources.note: These references are informational. Always follow local emergency guidance and professional medical advice.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: How we handle your data.
privacy.summary: Safe+Sound does not require an account. Most information stays on your device (e.g., language preference, recent searches, viewed guides).
privacy.cannot_open: Unable to open the Privacy Policy link.
